attr.q: Modify the sequence (x_n) so that it converges to \sqrt c.
attr.a: \frac 1 c x = \frac 1 x \rightarrow x = \left(1 - \frac 1 c\right)\left(x + \frac 1 {1 - \frac 1 c}\frac 1 x\right)
